.. _Connecting to Clients:

################################################################################
Connecting to GINAR Clients
################################################################################

(content will be updated later)

A number of libraries have been written to help address these issues, allowing application developers to focus on their applications, 
instead of the underlying plumbing to interact with Ethereum clients and the wider ecosystem.

+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| Library              | Language   | Project Page                                  |
+======================+============+===============================================+
| hhh                  | JavaScript | https://www.ginar.io/                         |
+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| iii                  | Java       | https://www.ginar.io/                         |
+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| jjj                  | C# .NET    | https://www.ginar.io/                         |
+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| kkk                  | Ruby       | https://www.ginar.io/                         |
+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
| lll                  | Python     | https://www.ginar.io/                         |
+----------------------+------------+-----------------------------------------------+
